body: This loose-fitting blouse is adorned with grotesque fetishes and trophies, granting the wearer a +2 competence bonus on Intimidate checks. If the wearer is a witch, she gains the cackle hex. If the wearer already has the cackle hex, twice per day she can use her cackle ability as a swift action instead of a move action.
name: Cackling Hag's Blouse
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Chest/Chest Slot Wondrous Items/Cackling Hags Blouse
